title: Kym Marsh is UNRECOGNISABLE as she dresses as Captain Jack Sparrow for Halloween bash
text:
She's leaving Coronation Street after 13 years.

But Kym Marsh was in high spirits as she shared an unrecognisable snap of herself looking identical to Johnny Depp as Captain Jack Sparrow on social media on Saturday day to ring in Halloween early on.

The soap actress, 43, hired make-up artist Armand Beasley to turn her into the lead character in the Pirates Of The Caribbean franchise on Saturday.

In character: Kym Marsh, 43, hired makeup artist Armand Beasley to turn her into the lead character in the Pirates of the Caribbean franchise on Saturday

Kym layered brown on brown to create the look for her brother's Halloween Party. She even sported a fake moustache and beard and wore a heavy black eyeliner to complete the look.

On her head she balanced a large pirates' hat on top of a bushy brunette wig filled with beads.

Multiple belts and scarves around her waist added to the ensemble before she tucked baggy trousers into her boots to finish the transformation.

Who's that? She transformed into Jonny Depp's character from the movies

Love: Kym is now dating boyfriend Scott Ratfliffe, 32, who is a major in the Parachute Regiment

It comes after Kym donned a fairytale wedding dress, a veil and a pair of trainers as she filmed some of her final scenes for Coronation Street in Manchester.

The scenes will see her get hitched to her on-screen fiancé Robert Preston during a drama-fuelled day on the cobbles. The wedding scenes, filmed on location in Manchester will be on screens in December.

The former Hear'Say singer is leaving Coronation Street as she plans to spend more time with her hunky army beau, Scott Ratfliffe, 32, who's often on his base in the south of England.

Happy days: It comes after Kym donned a fairytale wedding dress, a veil and a pair of trainers as she filmed some of her final scenes for Coronation Street in Manchester

Meanwhile, earlier this year, Kym stated that she dislikes her her partner being branded her 'toyboy', insisting that the term is 'insulting' to him.

Speaking in a candid chat to The Sun's Fabulous magazine, the star opened up about falling for Scott after previously stating that she was 'done' with men.

The couple were introduced by her co-star Anthony Cotton, with the pair building their relationship by talking for hours at a time via FaceTime and texting, before finally coming face-to-face three weeks later.

After revealing that she had already 'fallen' for him by the time they met, Kym said of Scott: 'Yeah, it’s love'. 'He has a smile that has the ability to light up any room...

Changing looks: Meanwhile, earlier this year, Kym stated that she dislikes her her partner being branded her 'toyboy', insisting that the term is 'insulting' to him

'He’s got a lovely aura about him. People want to be around him. And I love that he’s not got any idea how fit he is.'

But with an 11-year age gap, the former Hear'Say singer addressed the inevitability of her partner being hailed as her 'toyboy'.

'It’s actually quite insulting to him,' she fumed. 'Because he’s a very intelligent, mature, articulate man who absolutely knows where he wants to be in life.'

Kym has been dating Scott since July last year, following her split from Matt Baker, who she had been dating for two years.

Shocker: But with an 11-year age gap, the former Hear'Say singer addressed the inevitability of her partner being hailed as her 'toyboy'

The star was previously married to ex Hollyoaks favourite Jamie Lomas between 2012 and 2014. Before that she was wed to former EastEnders star Jack Ryder, 37, between 2002 and 2009.

Addressing her failed romances, she shared: 'I’m a huge romantic but I’ve been unlucky in love.

'My mum and dad have been together since my mum was 18 and the problem with that is that me and my sister are always looking for my dad. And he doesn’t exist because, well, Dad’s Dad!'

Meanwhile, there was recent joy in the soap star's life when she became a grandmother for the first time after daughter Emilie gave birth to a baby boy called Teddy in May.
description: Kym Marsh, 43, hired makeup artist Armand Beasley to turn her into the lead character in the Pirates of the Caribbean franchise on Saturday.
